awd_titl_txt: Search and Rescue in Collapsed Buildings
awd_abstract_narration: This research project sets out to document (1) the pre-existing plans           and regulations for search and rescue in Mexico City, (2) the actual            organization and management of search and rescue, (3) the activities of         ad hoc and international assistance teams in search and rescue, and (4)         the termination of search and rescue operations.  This documentation            will be carried out with the assistance of Proteccion Civil, a private          firm in Mexico City, consultants from the National Autonomous                   University of Mexico as well as contributions from U.S. and                     international teams that participated in the search and rescue effort.
org_div_long_name: Division of Civil, Mechanical, and Manufacturing Innovation

inst.inst_name: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University
